title: Reverse Speech - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/8/22
itunes:title: Reverse Speech - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/8/22
description:
George Noory and researcher David John Oates explore his discovery of hidden messages when speech recordings are played backwards, and how these messages can reveal the true feelings of the human subconscious.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
